airflow.title: Airflow Calculators
airflow.description: Tools for calculating airflow parameters in HVAC systems.

cfm.title: CFM Calculator
cfm.description: Calculate Cubic Feet per Minute based on room dimensions and air changes.

velocity.title: Air Velocity Calculator
velocity.description: Determine air velocity in ducts based on airflow and duct dimensions.

pressure.title: Pressure Drop Calculator
pressure.description: Estimate pressure loss in duct systems.

duct.title: Duct Calculators
duct.description: Tools for sizing and optimizing ductwork in HVAC designs.

size.title: Duct Sizing Calculator
size.description: Calculate optimal duct sizes based on airflow and velocity constraints.

friction.title: Friction Loss Calculator
friction.description: Estimate friction losses in duct runs.

energy.title: Energy Calculators
energy.description: Tools for analyzing energy usage and efficiency in HVAC systems.

load.title: Cooling/Heating Load Calculator
load.description: Estimate cooling and heating loads for spaces based on various factors.

efficiency.title: Energy Efficiency Calculator
efficiency.description: Analyze energy efficiency ratings and potential savings.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Get an overview of your HVAC projects and insights.

ai.title: AI Insights
ai.tip: Ask our AI for insights or optimizations related to your projects.
